Jesus, with solemn emphasis, repeated, "Verily, verily I say unto thee, Except a man be born of the water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God." The words of Jesus could no longer be misunderstood. His listener well knew that he referred to water baptism and the 
                                                                           128
grace of God. The power of the Holy Spirit transforms the entire man. This change constitutes the new birth.
